mapper.sql: id, year, city, county, area, country_zbje,other_zbje,comment, create_user,update_user,create_time,update_time

where.if: and ( LOWER(city) like LOWER(CONCAT("%",#{searchContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")) or LOWER(county) like LOWER(CONCAT("%",#{searchContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")) )
